MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in CW2 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Ravenscroft Road and the surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  2:13PM. Our engineers have arrived  on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by mdinight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:12pm on the 25th December 2020.
